title: Styling Text Boxes Using Bbox Parameters
description: In data visualization, it is important to highlight specific information to draw the viewer's attention. One way to do this is by styling text boxes using bbox parameters in Matplotlib. In this lab, we will learn how to style text boxes using bbox parameters in Matplotlib.
